casebody.data:
Pedro LAGUNA-ALDACO, petitioner,
v.
UNITED STATES; Edwin Pavon Aguilar, aka Edvin Leonel Aguilar, aka Edvin Leonel Pavon Aguilar, aka Carlos E. Villagrana, aka Edwin Aguilar, aka Edvin Leonel Pavon-Aguilar, petitioner,
v.
United States; Martin Jesus Rivas Medina, aka Martin Jesus Rivas, aka Martin Rivas, petitioner,
v.
United States; Hector Ramon Peralta-Mejia, petitioner,
v.
United States; Sergio De Jesus Vasquez-Rivera, petitioner,
v.
United States; and Juan Carlos Robinson-Jesus, petitioner,
v.
United States. No. 14-5299. Supreme Court of the United States Dec. 1, 2014.

Opinion

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit denied.
